mapper.sql: select user_id as userId, user_name as userName, user_sex as userSex, user_password as userPassword, user_phone as userPhone, user_swagger_id as userSwaggerId, user_portrait as userPortrait, user_bio as userBio, user_create_time as userCreateTime, user_modify_time as userModifyTime, user_login_info_id as userLoginInfoId, user_token as userToken from t_user_profile
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_profile( user_name, user_sex, user_password, user_phone, user_swagger_id, user_portrait, user_bio, user_create_time, user_modify_time, user_login_info_id ) values (#{userName}, #{userSex}, #{userPassword}, #{userPhone}, #{userSwaggerId}, #{userPortrait}, #{userBio}, #{userCreateTime}, #{userModifyTime}, #{userLoginInfoId});
insert into t_user_login_info( login_ip, login_place, login_time, is_logout, login_user_id ) values (#{loginIp}, #{loginPlace}, #{loginTime}, #{isLogout}, #{loginUserId})
mapper.select: select login_id as loginId, login_ip as loginIp, login_place as loginPlace, login_time as loginTime, is_logout as isLogout, login_user_id as loginUserId from t_user_login_info where login_id=#{loginId}
